Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Corner properties located at State Route 224 and Massillon Road George Washington Blvd

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The subject land is approximately 25.12 acres with mixed zoning. Parcel number 2800371 has two existing structures on the property: 1,300 SF raised ranch dwelling and a 4,256 SF one-story pole building. Two (2) water wells and a septic system currently serve the existing structures. All public utilities are available to the site.

The City of Green is an ideal location for today’s modern workforce offering land for development on E Turkeyfoot Lake Road. Easy access to I-77 and two main interchanges with great proximity to numerous amenities. Within a 10-15 minute drive, this land is in close proximity to Belden Village (numerous restaurants, hotels, shopping), Akron-Canton Airport, Downtown Akron and many other services. Right around the corner from the Massillon Road interchange, substantial development has occurred. Notable developments include: Acre Fresh Market, Starbucks, Hot Head Burritos, Summa Health Green Emergency Department and many more inline retailers.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
+ Parcel #2800371 – 25.12 acres
+ Located in the City of Green
+ Within close proximity to multiple restaurants, banks, and other services
+ Site is minutes from I-77 with access to two (2) interchanges
+ Two existing structures on the property: 1,300 SF raised ranch dwelling and a 4,256 SF one-story pole barn (2 water wells and septic system currently serve existing structures)
+ Located in the City of Green CRA (Community Reinvestment Area) with abatement opportunities
+ City water and sewer available to the site
+ Approximately 1,200 SF of frontage on E Turkeyfoot
+ Mixed Zoning: B-1: General Business, I: General Industrial, R-1: Single Family Residential
+ Taxes: $2,448.49 per half
+ For Sale: $2,100,000

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located across the street from Lowe's at a signalized intersection averaging over 9,000 vehicles per day.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Situated in Bath Township, Ohio, these parcels are located in the heart of the Montrose-Fairlawn office and retail market. This site is best suited for an office or institutional use.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Commercial Land for Sale in Montrose - Price Reduced!

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Property located just two miles south of I-77 and 1/2 mile from State Route 21
Located in the heart of Copley

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is located Located in the heart of Copley, just a quarter mile north of the Copley Circle and two miles south of I-77 and half mile east from SR-21.
